verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Thank you, Lord for the trials that come my way,
In that way I can grow each day as I let You lead.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And thank You, Lord for the patience those trials bring,
In that process of growing I can learn to care.

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
But it goes against the way I am to put my human nature down,
And let the Spirit take control of all I do .

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
'Cause when those trials come, my human nature shouts the thing to do;
And God's soft prompting can be easily ignored.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I thank You Lord with each trial I feel inside,
That you're there to help lead and guide me away from wrong,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
'Cause You promised, Lord, that with ev'ry testing
That Your way of escaping is easier to bear.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
I thank You, Lord for the vic'try that growing brings,
In surrender of ev'rything life is so worth while.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
And I thank You Lord that when ev'rything's put in place,
Out in front I can see Your face and it's there You belong.
